alert.note: Alert for Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:27AM CDT until May 06 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Covington County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 526 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Andalusia to 13 miles west of Lockhart to 6 miles southwest of Laurel Hill to near Crestview, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Crestview, Opp, Florala, Laurel Hill and Lockhart. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
